text.sentence: Marcus: When we were in New Orleans I mentioned that I might be planning a holiday in Germany - well, I've finally gotten around to scheduling it.
I'm flying into Munich on the 27th and leaving from Amsterdam September 9.
If you are going to be in the office next Monday or Tuesday (when I'll be in the London office), I'd really appreciate a few minutes of your time to get whatever suggestions you would like to make.
If you will be out next week, maybe we could chat by phone tomorrow or Friday.
